query:
SELECT
                 COALESCE(SUM(m.metadata_size), 0) +
                 COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(m.data_size, m.expected_data_size)), 0) AS big_int
            FROM metadata m
            INNER JOIN buckets b ON b.id = m.bucket_id
            WHERE b.user_id = $1 AND m.state IN ('current', 'outdated', 'pending');
